name: RelayModule
description: The "RelayModule" Library is a C++ library providing an interface and implementation for controlling relay modules. It allows users to easily integrate relay functionality into ESP32/Arduino projects, offering methods for turning on/off, toggling, and checking the current state of the relay.
keywords: Relay Module, Relay Control, Relay Library, Arduino Library, ESP32 Relay, ESP8266 Relay, MetaHouse
